episodes.title: The Kingpin Strategy
episodes.plot: The Gentlemen of Cali gather their associates together for a big surprise announcement about the future of their business.

episodes.title: The Cali KGB
episodes.plot: A gas incident threatens to destroy the agreement between Cali and the government and requires Jorge's help. Peña has problems with his old contact in Los Pepes.

episodes.title: Follow the Money
episodes.plot: The Rodríguez brothers are hiding during the negotiations. Pacho meets the Lord of the Heavens in Mexico. Peña's new DEA team visits Cali.

episodes.title: Checkmate
episodes.plot: Peña hatches a plan to try to capture Cali leader Gilberto Rodriguez. Amado proposes a business idea to Pacho.

episodes.title: MRO
episodes.plot: Paranoid about leaks, Miguel cracks down on his security. Pacho makes a decision about his new offer. Peña works on cultivating a witness.

episodes.title: Best Laid Plans
episodes.plot: Jorge takes a dangerous risk. An accident in New York threatens to expose Chepe. Peña travels to Curacao to arrest a potential witness.

episodes.title: Sin Salida
episodes.plot: Peña plans another secret operation to topple a member of the Cali cartel but may run out of time while looking for him.

episodes.title: Convivir
episodes.plot: David seeks revenge on behalf of his father and puts Enrique in danger. Peña asks Don Berna for help on a rescue mission.

episodes.title: Todos Los Hombres del Presidente
episodes.plot: David follows his suspicions. Peña is shocked to discover the depth of corruption in the Colombian government. Miguel is sought after once again.

episodes.title: Going Back to Cali
episodes.plot: David and Peña are in a race against each other to find Pallomari. Peña makes a serious decision about the future of his career.
